attributes.action: STOP JOBLESS REFUGEES, IMMIGRANTS & UNEMPLOYED BRITISH NATIONALS GETTING LUXURY HOMES
attributes.additional_details: It is becoming more of a regular occurance for jobless refugees, immigrants and and British National Citizens to be provided housing which the common working class individual would class as 'a luxury'.Why is the tax payer having to fund for these people to live in luxury while we work 7 days a week to live in run down houses where by we just work to pay bills and to make ends meet?
